entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 35 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
